attributes.action: Fashion industry should be legally responsible for healthy body images
attributes.additional_details:
The fashion industry holds a massive responsibilty for body image especially in adolescents and pre-teens. It has recently come to light that the industry have pushed the boundries of PLUS SIZE back to size 8.  This WILL  lead to a dangerous behaviours in youngsters that will fear being labled such.

We want regulations on sizing pushing plus size back to a size 18

AND

We want fashion houses to use REAL WOMAN in larger sizes as their models

Lets promote realist healthy bodies as beautiful
